00021 include_once("poste.php");
00022 
00023 class Balance {
00024   var $db; // database connection
00025   var $central; 
00026   var $row;
00027   function Balance($p_cn) {
00028     $this->db=$p_cn;
00029     $this->central='N';
00030   }
00031 
00032   function GetRow($p_from_periode,$p_to_periode) {
00033     // compute periode
00034     if ( $p_from_periode==$p_to_periode ) {
00035       $per_sql=" j_tech_per = $p_from_periode ";
00036     } else {
00037       $per_sql = "j_tech_per >=  $p_from_periode and j_tech_per <= $p_to_periode ";
00038     }
00039 
00040 
00041     // if centralized
00042     $cent="";
00043 
00044     if ( $this->central=='Y' ) { $cent="j_centralized = true and "; }
00045 
00046     // build query
00047     $sql="select j_poste,sum(deb) as sum_deb, sum(cred) as sum_cred from 
00048           ( select j_poste,
00049              case when j_debit='t' then j_montant else 0 end as deb,
00050              case when j_debit='f' then j_montant else 0 end as cred
00051           from jrnx join tmp_pcmn on j_poste=pcm_val
00052               where 
00053              $cent
00054             $per_sql ) as m group by j_poste order by j_poste::text";
00055 
00056     $Res=ExecSql($this->db,$sql);
00057 
00058     $tot_cred=  0.0;
00059     $tot_deb=  0.0;
00060     $tot_deb_saldo=0.0;
00061     $tot_cred_saldo=0.0;
00062     $M=pg_NumRows($Res);
00063     // Load the array
00064     for ($i=0; $i <$M;$i++) {
00065       $r=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00066       $a['poste']=$r['j_poste'];
00067       $a['label']=substr(GetPosteLibelle($this->db,$r['j_poste'],1),0,40);
00068       $a['sum_deb']=round($r['sum_deb'],2);
00069       $a['sum_cred']=round($r['sum_cred'],2);
00070       $a['solde_deb']=round(( $a['sum_deb']  >=  $a['sum_cred'] )? $a['sum_deb']- $a['sum_cred']:0,2);
00071       $a['solde_cred']=round(( $a['sum_deb'] <=  $a['sum_cred'] )?$a['sum_cred']-$a['sum_deb']:0,2);
00072       $array[$i]=$a;
00073       $tot_cred+=  $a['sum_cred'];
00074       $tot_deb+= $a['sum_deb']; 
00075       $tot_deb_saldo+= $a['solde_deb'];
00076       $tot_cred_saldo+= $a['solde_cred'];
00077       
00078       
00079     }//for i
00080     // Add the saldo
00081     $i+=1;
00082     $a['poste']="";
00083     $a['label']="<b> Totaux </b>";
00084     $a['sum_deb']=$tot_deb;
00085     $a['sum_cred']=$tot_cred;
00086     $a['solde_deb']=$tot_deb_saldo;
00087     $a['solde_cred']=$tot_cred_saldo;
00088     $array[$i]=$a;
00089     $this->row=$array;
00090     return $array;
00091 
00092   }
00093 }
